member.name: T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeLibraryHandle
member.summary: Represents a handle to a Windows module (DLL).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeLibraryHandle.GetProcAddress``1(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a delegate pointing to a given export from this library.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeLibraryHandle.ForbidUnload
member.summary: Forbids this library from being unloaded. The library will remain loaded until process termination, regardless of how many times FreeLibrary is called.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeLibraryHandle.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a library. If 'filename' is not a fully-qualified path, the default search path is used.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.SP800_108Helper
member.summary: Provides an implementation of the SP800-108-CTR-HMACSHA512 key derivation function. This class assumes at least Windows 7 / Server 2008 R2.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.SP800_108Helper.DeriveKeys(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Byte*,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Performs a key derivation using SP800-108-CTR-HMACSHA512.
member.param: Pointer to the key derivation key.
Length (in bytes) of the key derivation key.
Purpose to attach to the generated subkey. Corresponds to the 'Label' parameter in the KDF. May be null.
Pointer to a buffer which will receive the subkey.
Length (in bytes) of the output buffer.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider
member.summary: A factory that can provide IDataProtector instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider.CreateProtector(System.String)
member.summary: Given a purpose, returns a new IDataProtector that has unique cryptographic keys tied to this purpose.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.DataProtectionProvider
member.summary: Provides methods for creating IDataProtectionProvider instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.DataProtectionProvider.CreateFromDpapi
member.summary: Creates a new IDataProtectionProvider backed by DPAPI.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.DataProtectionProvider.CreateNew
member.summary: Creates a new IDataProtectionProvider with a randomly-generated master key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.DataProtectionProvider.CreateFromKey(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new IDataProtectionProvider with the provided master key.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.IDataProtector
member.summary: Represents an object that can perform cryptographic operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.IDataProtector.CreateSubProtector(System.String)
member.summary: Given a subpurpose, returns a new IDataProtector that has unique cryptographic keys tied both the purpose that was used to create this IDataProtector instance and the purpose that is provided as a parameter to this method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.IDataProtector.Protect(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Cryptographically protects some input data.
member.returns: An array containing cryptographically protected data.
member.remarks: To retrieve the original data, call Unprotect on the protected data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.DataProtection.IDataProtector.Unprotect(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Retrieves the original data that was protected by a call to Protect.
member.param: The protected data to be decrypted.
member.remarks: Throws CryptographicException if the protectedData parameter has been tampered with.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.MemoryUtil.UnalignedWrite(System.Void*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes an Int32 to a potentially unaligned memory address.
member.remarks: The endian-ness of the current architecture is preserved.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.BufferUtil.SecureZeroMemory(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Securely clears a memory buffer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.BufferUtil.SecureZeroMemory(System.Byte*,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Securely clears a memory buffer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.BufferUtil.ToManagedByteArray(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new managed byte[] from unmanaged memory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.BufferUtil.ToManagedByteArray(System.Byte*,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Creates a new managed byte[] from unmanaged memory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.BufferUtil.ToProtectedManagedByteArray(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Security.Cryptography.MemoryProtectionScope)
member.summary: Creates a new managed byte[] from unmanaged memory. The returned value will be protected by CryptProtectMemory.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Resources.Res
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Resources.Res.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Resources.Res.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Resources.Res.DataProtectorFactory_MasterKeyTooShort
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The master key is too short. It must be at least {0} bytes in length..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Resources.Res.DataProtectorImpl_BadEncryptedData
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The data to decrypt is invalid..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Resources.Res.DpapiDataProtectorImpl_ProfileNotLoaded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Couldn't protect data. Perhaps the user profile isn't loaded?.

member.summary: Implements the 'cpblk' opcode without going through the perf-destorying overhead of reflection emit.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.IIS.Security.Util.ILHelpers.unaligned_stind_i4(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Implements the 'unaligned. 1 stind.i4' opcode without going through the perf-destroying overhead of reflection emit.

member.summary: Implements the 'volatile.initblk' opcode without going through the perf-destroying overhead of reflection emit.
